mapper.insert: INSERT into player(name, POSITION, team_id, is_outer, created_at) VALUES(#{name},#{position},#{teamId},0,now());
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, row_number() over(order BY p.id asc) as NO, t.name teamName, p.position, p.NAME, p.created_at from player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.team_id = t.id
